name: AZLyrics Dark Blue
description: Complete dark blue recolour with minor improvements and minimalisations for a much more pleasant night-browsing experience. The footer is removed, the gap under the lyrics shortened, and visited links on the lyrics page are no longer disturbing by not having the same color as unvisited links.
additional_info: This is my first user style I made from scratch. As seen on the screenshots, about every part of the website should now have a uniform dark blue look, including the lyrics submission page. If you find any discrepancies, please let me know!
